original_title: Cómo se hizo "La hora de los hornos"
overview: An extensive interview with Fernando Solanas and an important amount of unpublished material, the documentary describes the process of making the most influential film of Latin American cinema. It was done exclusively to accompany its home release.
tagline: The behind-the-scenes story about the most influential film of Latin American cinema
title: Cómo se hizo "La hora de los hornos"
